entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: I don't even think there's a strategy here. Trump can't face the reality of his failure, so he clings to the belief that there isn't really a Covid surge, that it's all because of testing. And WH officials are catering to his delusions https://t.co/JTwoSNINVb
